org.agilewiki.utils.immutable

Interface ImmutableFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseFactory, BlockReferenceFactory, BooleanFactory, CS256Factory, DoubleFactory, FalseFactory, FloatFactory, IntegerFactory, ListNodeFactory, ListReferenceFactory, LongFactory, MapNodeFactory, MapReferenceFactory, NilListNodeFactory, NilMapNodeFactory, NullFactory, StringFactory, TrueFactory, VersionedListNodeFactory, VersionedListReferenceFactory, VersionedMapNodeFactory, VersionedMapReferenceFactory, VersionedNilListNodeFactory, VersionedNilMapNodeFactory

    public interface ImmutableFactory
    Defines how a class of immutable is serialized / deserialized.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object deserialize(java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
      Deserialize an immutable object from the content of a ByteBuffer.
      int getDurableLength(java.lang.Object immutable)
      Returns the size of a byte array needed to serialize the durable object, including the space needed for the durable id.
      char getId()
      Returns a char used to identify the durable factory in a serialized object.
      default char getId(java.lang.Object durable)
      Returns a value-specific durable id.
      java.lang.Class getImmutableClass()
      Returns the class of an immutable that the factory serializes / deserializes.
      default ImmutableFactory getImmutableFactory(java.lang.Object immutable)
      Returns a value-specific factory.
      default void match(java.lang.Object immutable)
      Validate that the immutable object is a match for the factory.
      void serialize(java.lang.Object immutable, java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
      Serialize an immutable object into a ByteBuffer.
      default java.nio.ByteBuffer toByteBuffer(java.lang.Object immutable)
      Returns a ByteBuffer loaded with the serialized contents of the immutable.
      default void writeDurable(java.lang.Object immutable, java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
      Write the immutable to a byte buffer.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        char getId()
        Returns a char used to identify the durable factory in a serialized object.
        Returns:
        A char used to identify the factory.

      • getImmutableClass

        java.lang.Class getImmutableClass()
        Returns the class of an immutable that the factory serializes / deserializes.
        Returns:
        The immutable class.

      • getImmutableFactory

        default ImmutableFactory getImmutableFactory(java.lang.Object immutable)
        Returns a value-specific factory.
        Parameters:
        immutable - The immutable object.
        Returns:
        The durable factory specific to the value.

      • getId

        default char getId(java.lang.Object durable)
        Returns a value-specific durable id.
        Parameters:
        durable - The immutable object.
        Returns:
        The value-specific durable id.

      • match

        default void match(java.lang.Object immutable)
        Validate that the immutable object is a match for the factory.
        Parameters:
        immutable - The immutable object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the object is not a match.

      • getDurableLength

        int getDurableLength(java.lang.Object immutable)
        Returns the size of a byte array needed to serialize the durable object, including the space needed for the durable id.
        Parameters:
        immutable - The immutable object to be serialized.
        Returns:
        The size in bytes of the serialized data.

      • writeDurable

        default void writeDurable(java.lang.Object immutable,
                          java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
        Write the immutable to a byte buffer.
        Parameters:
        immutable - The immutable object to be serialized.
        byteBuffer - The byte buffer.

      • serialize

        void serialize(java.lang.Object immutable,
               java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
        Serialize an immutable object into a ByteBuffer.
        Parameters:
        immutable - The immutable object to be serialized.
        byteBuffer - Where the serialized data is to be placed.

      • deserialize

        java.lang.Object deserialize(java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
        Deserialize an immutable object from the content of a ByteBuffer.
        Parameters:
        byteBuffer - Holds the data used to create the immutable object.
        Returns:
        The deserialized object.

      • toByteBuffer

        default java.nio.ByteBuffer toByteBuffer(java.lang.Object immutable)
        Returns a ByteBuffer loaded with the serialized contents of the immutable.
        Parameters:
        immutable - The immutable to be serialized.
        Returns:
        The loaded ByteBuffer.
